title: ICAI CA Form Correction Window Open for January 2026 Exams
content:
# ICAI CA Form Correction Window Open for January 2026 Exams

The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) has opened the application form correction window for candidates who have registered for the CA January 2026 examinations. The window became active today, November 20, 2025, at 10:00 AM IST.

*   Candidates can make corrections to their submitted online examination forms for the CA Foundation, Intermediate, and Final courses.
*   The correction window will remain open until November 22, 2025, at 11:59 PM IST.
*   During this period, applicants can edit specific details, including their chosen exam center, the medium of examination, or their group selection (for Intermediate and Final exams).
*   No other fields in the application form are editable.
*   To make changes, candidates must log in to the ICAI e-services portal at eservices.icai.org using their single sign-on (SSO) credentials.
*   The correction process is a one-time opportunity and is free of charge.
